Description: The following statement contains a magic number: while ( !_done )              {                  LoggingEvent loggingEvent = null;                  lock ( _latch )                      if ( _queue.Count > 0 )                          loggingEvent = _queue.Dequeue();                    if ( loggingEvent != null )                  {                      var timer = Stopwatch.StartNew();                      string formattedStatement = _formatter.Execute( loggingEvent.RenderedMessage );                      timer.Stop();                                            string message = String.Format(                          "{0}\n-- Duration: {1:0:00:0000}"' formattedStatement' timer.ElapsedMilliseconds                      );                        var data = new LoggingEventData                      {                          Message     = message'                          TimeStamp   = loggingEvent.TimeStamp'                          Level       = loggingEvent.Level'                          LoggerName  = loggingEvent.LoggerName'                          ThreadName  = loggingEvent.ThreadName'                          UserName    = loggingEvent.UserName'                          Identity    = loggingEvent.Identity'                          Domain      = loggingEvent.Domain                      };                      base.Append( new LoggingEvent( data ) );                  }                  Thread.Sleep( 200 );              }
